page.title: 04NEW HOUSES IN BROUGHTON
page.content: WE DID AN INTERVIEW WITH ONE OF THE LADIES WHO WORKS FOR THE ESTATE AGENTS, TILLEY AND MORGAN. THEY ARE SELLING THE BRAND NEW HOUSES BUILT BY CHARTER HOMES. THERE ARE SEMI-DETACHED HOUSES, DETACHED HOUSES AND BUNGALOWS FOR SALE. THEY ARE IN A MOCK TUDOR STYLE WITH WOODEN BEAMS.IT TAKES SIX MONTHS TO BUILD EACH HOUSE.THE PRICES START FROM 19,750 POUNDS FOR THE TWO-BEDROOMED, SEMI-DETACHED FALSTAFF HOUSE TO 43,750 POUNDS FOR THE FOUR-BEDROOMED, DETACHED MARLBOROUGH HOUSE.ALL THE ROADS ARE NAMED AFTER PEOPLE WHO LIVED IN BROUGHTON.THESE HOUSES HAVE BEEN EASY TO SELL BECAUSE THEY ARE A VERY REASONABLE PRICE.SIMILAR HOUSES IN NORTHAMPTON OR KETTERING ARE DEARER. ALSO, PEOPLE LIKE TO LIVE IN A VILLAGE ESPECIALLY NOW THAT THE BYPASS IS BUILT.MOST OF THE NEW PEOPLE HAVE COME FROM KETTERING AND NORTHAMPTON.
